executable.title: Foreground masking (BRAINS)
executable.description: This program is used to create a mask over the most prominent foreground region in an image. This is accomplished via a combination of otsu thresholding and a closing operation.
executable.contributor: Hans J. Johnson, hans-johnson -at- uiowa.edu, http://www.psychiatry.uiowa.edu
executable.acknowledgements: Hans Johnson(1,3,4); Kent Williams(1); Gregory Harris(1), Vincent Magnotta(1,2,3); Andriy Fedorov(5), fedorov -at- bwh.harvard.edu (Slicer integration); (1=University of Iowa Department of Psychiatry, 2=University of Iowa Department of Radiology, 3=University of Iowa Department of Biomedical Engineering, 4=University of Iowa Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, 5=Surgical Planning Lab, Harvard)

image.name: inputVolume
image.label: Input Image Volume
image.description: The input image for finding the largest region filled mask.

image.name: outputROIMaskVolume
image.label: Output Mask
image.description: The ROI automatically found from the input image.

image.name: outputVolume
image.label: Output Image
image.description: The inputVolume with optional [maskOutput|cropOutput] to the region of the brain mask.

boolean.name: maskOutput
boolean.label: Mask Output
boolean.description: The inputVolume multiplied by the ROI mask.

boolean.name: cropOutput
boolean.label: Output Image Clipped by ROI
boolean.description: The inputVolume cropped to the region of the ROI mask.

double.name: otsuPercentileThreshold
double.label: Otsu Percentile Threshold
double.description: Parameter to the Otsu threshold algorithm.

double.name: thresholdCorrectionFactor
double.label: Otsu Correction Factor
double.description: A factor to scale the Otsu algorithm's result threshold, in case clipping mangles the image.

double.name: closingSize
double.label: Closing Size
double.description: The Closing Size (in millimeters) for largest connected filled mask. This value is divided by image spacing and rounded to the next largest voxel number.

double.name: ROIAutoDilateSize
double.label: ROIAuto Dilate Size
double.description: This flag is only relevant when using ROIAUTO mode for initializing masks. It defines the final dilation size to capture a bit of background outside the tissue region. At setting of 10mm has been shown to help regularize a BSpline registration type so that there is some background constraints to match the edges of the head better.

string-enumeration.name: outputVolumePixelType
string-enumeration.label: Output Image Pixel Type
string-enumeration.description: The output image Pixel Type is the scalar datatype for representation of the Output Volume.

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.
